export_metadata.export_scope: Workflow rules, milestone definitions, role-based access, business rules

milestone_definitions.name: Application Received
milestone_definitions.trigger: All six TRID trigger fields populated

milestone_definitions.name: Loan Estimate Delivered
milestone_definitions.trigger: Manual - set upon LE delivery confirmation
milestone_definitions.validation_rule: Must be set within 3 business days of MS-001

milestone_definitions.name: Intent to Proceed Received
milestone_definitions.trigger: Manual - set upon borrower intent confirmation
milestone_definitions.gate_rule: Blocks service ordering if not set

milestone_definitions.name: File Assigned to Processor
milestone_definitions.trigger: Loan file routed to processing queue

milestone_definitions.name: Services Ordered
milestone_definitions.trigger: Manual - set when all third-party services ordered

milestone_definitions.name: Appraisal Received
milestone_definitions.trigger: Appraisal document uploaded to vault with type code 'APPR'

milestone_definitions.name: Submitted to Underwriting
milestone_definitions.trigger: Manual - processor routes file to UW queue
milestone_definitions.validation_rule: Processor checklist must be marked complete

milestone_definitions.name: Conditions Cleared
milestone_definitions.trigger: All conditions in Conditions tab marked 'Cleared'

milestone_definitions.name: Clear to Close
milestone_definitions.validation_rule: All PTD and PTC conditions must be cleared

milestone_definitions.name: Closing Disclosure Delivered
milestone_definitions.trigger: Manual - set upon CD delivery confirmation

milestone_definitions.name: Closing Scheduled
milestone_definitions.validation_rule: Closing date must be >= 3 business days after MS-011

milestone_definitions.name: Closed
milestone_definitions.trigger: Manual - closing documents received and verified

milestone_definitions.name: Shipped to Investor
milestone_definitions.trigger: Manual - loan delivery confirmed by secondary marketing

workflow_rules.name: TRID LE Timer Alert
workflow_rules.condition: MS-002 not set within 2 business days
workflow_rules.action: Send alert to LO, Processor, and Compliance

workflow_rules.name: Block Services Before Intent
workflow_rules.action: Block action with message: 'Intent to Proceed required before ordering services'

workflow_rules.name: OFAC Screening Gate
workflow_rules.trigger_event: Milestone MS-007 or MS-011 advancement attempted
workflow_rules.condition: OFAC screening not completed or status = 'Potential Match Unresolved'

workflow_rules.name: Rate Lock Expiration Warning
workflow_rules.condition: Rate lock expiration within 7 calendar days AND loan not at MS-013
workflow_rules.action: Send alert to LO and Processor
workflow_rules.notes: Changed from 5 days to 7 days per Processing Manager request, Oct 2024

workflow_rules.name: Compliance Check on Submission
workflow_rules.action: Run automated TRID compliance check; flag any violations in Compliance Alert queue

workflow_rules.name: CD Waiting Period Gate
workflow_rules.condition: Closing date < 3 business days after MS-011 (CD delivery)
workflow_rules.action: Block milestone with message: 'Closing date violates 3-business-day waiting period'

workflow_rules.name: Post-Close QC Sample Selection
workflow_rules.condition: Random 10% selection OR exception_flag = true OR early_payment_default = true
workflow_rules.action: Route to QC queue for post-close review

workflow_rules.name: Stale Document Alert
workflow_rules.condition: Document with type 'PAYSTUB' older than 25 days OR 'BANKSTMT' older than 55 days
workflow_rules.notes: DISABLED - Configuration incomplete. IT ticket INC-2024-03892 pending since Q1 2024. Processors using manual spreadsheet as workaround.

business_rules.name: AUS Requirement
business_rules.description: All loans must be run through appropriate AUS before submission to underwriting

business_rules.name: Credit Report Vendor
business_rules.description: All tri-merge credit reports must be ordered through approved vendor

business_rules.name: AMC Rotation
business_rules.description: Appraisal orders routed through ValuTrac AMC portal with automatic rotation

business_rules.name: Exception Logging
business_rules.description: All guideline exceptions must be logged in Exception Tracking module with unique ID
business_rules.approval_workflow: Route to authority level per LO-POL-001 Section 8

business_rules.name: Adverse Action Notice
business_rules.description: Denial decisions automatically trigger adverse action notice generation
